name: consensually
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
with the willing agreement of all the people involved: She admitted that she took part in the programme consensually. We have daily meetings where we make decisions consensually.
More examplesFewer examplesI hope that this disagreement can be resolved consensually.The woman said that they had kissed consensually.They had reached the age where they could consensually have sex.This sort of conduct will not be tolerated even if people engage in it consensually.
